name: The Fool
prompts: Skip your next turn.
Do your dumbest dance for 10 seconds.
You are now the Fool. If anyone says your name, you do a dare.

name: Death
prompts: Everyone does a dare.
Reset all ongoing rules — the game is reborn.
Swap seats with someone and perform a joint dare.

name: The Lovers
prompts: Pick 2 players to perform this dare together.
Choose a partner for the next 3 rounds — actions affect both.
Answer a romantic truth or accept a couple's dare.

name: The Tower
prompts: Answer a difficult truth or take a double-dare.
If you refuse, take the punishment card next round.
Everyone votes — pass or fail. Fail = drink/do a dare.

name: The Wheel of Fortune
prompts: Spin the wheel of fate: choose truth, dare, swap, or steal. The group decides the outcome.
Your luck shifts — give one player your next punishment.
Everyone draws a mini-fate: each player gives you a one-line truth or dare.

name: Judgment
prompts: Stand up and justify one past action — the group will judge if it's truth or lie.
Everyone votes on your performance this round. Majority decides your fate.
Call out one player — they receive your next dare unless they confess something real.

name: The Hermit
prompts: Take a 10-second introspection: reveal a personal truth or skip your next move.
Choose one player for a private whisper dare — they must announce the result.
You may sit out the next group challenge, but someone must volunteer in your place.

name: The Devil
prompts: Temptation time — offer a deal to any player. If they accept, both do a shared dare.
You may force one player to choose between a bold truth or a spicy dare.
All players reveal a guilty pleasure. You choose one person to act on theirs.
